explains: adj. 残疾的，弱智的；残障人士专用的
wordGroup: mentally handicapped 智力障碍的；精神障碍的
handicapped child 残障儿童，缺陷儿童；残废儿童

sentences.en: State help for the mentally handicapped is pitifully inadequate.
sentences.cn: 国家对智障者的帮助少得可怜。

sentences.en: I'm going to work two days a week teaching handicapped kids to fish.
sentences.cn: 我将每周工作两天教残疾儿童钓鱼。

sentences.en: He was indeed ahead of his time in employing women, ex-convicts, and the handicapped.
sentences.cn: 他的确思想先进，雇用了女性、刑满释放犯和残疾人。
